origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'CommodityMarketAPI.get_realtime_prices', 'description': 'This function provides real-time prices for specified commodities.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'commodities', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of commodities for which real-time prices are requested.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'prices', 'description': 'A dictionary mapping each commodity to its real-time price.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 CommodityMarketAPI.get_realtime_prices, 它的参数输入如下: 'commodities'是['crude_oil', 'copper'].
